page.title: 08Sherburn-in-Elmet,Gala.
page.content: {Events in Sherburn-Sherburn Gala.}In 1975 the first gala was held.On the middle Saturday in May every year since then there has been a gala with a procession of floats.With the money raised from these galas it is hoped to build a leisure centre either on Eversley Park or behind the Forester's pub.Many societies and clubs enter the float competition.Our school's entry this year being the Black and White Minstrels.At 1pm.the procession of decorative floats,marching bands and other vehicles set off through the village where people line the streets,waving to it as it passes.The procession leads into Eversley Park and then the gala is opened by the reigning gala queen.There are stalls round the edge of the field with an arena in the middle where larger events and displays take place.
